description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $7.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Cougar Engineering Construction. The average
  contract duration was 1.1 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $4.0M. The longest
  contract was 1.52 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $5.7M.
